Package neon.physics

Class RectangularHitbox

java.lang.Object
neon.physics.Hitbox
neon.physics.RectangularHitbox
public class RectangularHitbox extends Hitbox
A class used to simulate the physics and interactions of rectangular hitboxes.

    • unintersect

      public boolean unintersect​(Hitbox other)
      Description copied from class: Hitbox
      Shifts the hitbox in order to prevent it from intersecting with another hitbox. When shifting, the hitbox takes the path of least resistance.
      Specified by:
      unintersect in class Hitbox
      Parameters:
      other - the other hitbox
      Returns:
      whether the hitboxes collided
